title: How to Rob a Store in Grand Theft Auto: Vice City

steps.headline: Obtain a gun with a lock-on target mechanism.
steps.description: Suitable guns include pistols, sub-machine guns, or shotguns.

steps.headline: Drive to a store that can be robbed.
steps.description: There are 15 stores to be robbed. See the next section for a detailed list of available stores.

steps.headline: Walk into the store and find the store owner.
steps.description: He is usually wearing a brown shirt and glasses and found behind the checkout counter.

steps.headline: Aim your gun at him but do not shoot.
steps.description: He will raise his hands in fear. A glowing stack of money will appear on the counter. The longer you keep aiming at him, the more money you'll get. However, you'll also get a wanted level. One stack won't do anything. Two will give you a one-star wanted level. Three stacks will give you two stars, and finally four stacks (the most) will result in a three-star wanted level.

steps.headline: Collect the money and quickly leave the store.
steps.description: You only have to take one stack for it to count on your stats, but you can get away with $1000 if you're able to shake off your three-star wanted level.

steps.headline: Get rid of your wanted level.
steps.description: You can visit a Pay 'n Spray, find police bribes, change your clothes, or just wait it off (if it's only one star).
